about_the_game:
City Turn is a colourful 2D single player, turn based game.
The player is competing against a program (AI) in finding the same 5 images in the given order. Purple player is the program.
The city is 8x8 board of buildings and there is a map showing two stars as a player's positions.
Player can win/loose points and be hit by the various objects, there are some coming out from the buildings too.
If not actively playing the ramp will appear.
There are 10 different buildings: caffes, market, hotel, gallery...
The idea is to memorise which and where image was found by you or another player. Instead of timer there's another player.
Buildings are stored differently for each game on a game load.
On the replay buildings would be in the same place, but images to find and their location would be different.
